title: SPAT-Based Mobile Social Learning Content Design

context.additional_context: Mobile device-based microlearning of social studies content in BYOD environments, utilizing SPAT-formatted content (integrating static images, audio, and text).

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain core concepts of social studies (democracy, human rights, cultural diversity, etc.) with over 80% accuracy through SPAT-formatted mobile content
Learners can analyze the causes and effects of historical events in a three-stage structure using 5-minute SPAT content in a microlearning environment
Learners can write a 200-character comparative analysis of social phenomena based on SPAT materials provided on mobile devices
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
